translation: Others again offer wealth, austerity, and Yoga as sacrifice, while ascetics of self-restraint and rigid vows offer the study of scriptures and knowledge as sacrifice.
commentary: 4.28 Dravyayajnaḥ those who offer wealth as sacrifice? Tapoyajnaḥ those who offer austerity as sacrifice? Yoga Yajnas those who offer Yoga as sacrifice? And thus? Other others? Svadhyayajnayajnah those who offer study and knowledge as sacrifice? f and? Yatis ascetics or anchorites (persons of selfrestraint)? sanshitavrataḥ persons of rigid vows.Commentary Some do sacrifice by distributing their wealth to
